meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Eugene Chuang Robin Raffer Andrew Moore Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6632.

td.p: Eugene Chuang, a structural engineer from Boston, Massachusetts
Robin Raffer, a picture researcher from Brooklyn, New York
Andrew Moore, a test prep instructor from Buford, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $31,201)

tr.td: THE GILDED PAGE
AT THE DRUGSTORE
DECORATIVE ARTS
MOVIE TITLE ADD A LETTER
(Alex: For instance, instead of coming up with "What is A Knight's Tale?" the correct response would be "What is A Knight's Table?", adding one letter.)
2001: A CATEGORY ODYSSEY
"THE" END
(And those 3 letters--"T-H-E"--will come at the end of each correct response.)

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Andrew: What is Casino Royale?)

Goldfinger

AndrewRobinEugene
Triple Stumper
')
